snippet: Geico’s “Across America” campaign is one of several the company is running simultaneously, a tactic intended to offset fatigue that may set in among consumers.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column highlights Geico's 'Across America' campaign featuring the gecko brand character, one of several the insurance company is running simultaneously.
lead_paragraph: Geico’s “Across America” campaign is one of several the company is running simultaneously, a tactic intended to offset fatigue that may set in among consumers.

headline.seo: Geico Elects to Go With Variety in Campaigns - Advertising
headline.main: Choosing to Break Up Monotony With Variety
headline.print_headline: Choosing To Break Up Monotony With Variety
